text: Ok yes it's sushi but it's the fast food of sushi nothing great counter staff were very nice. Place was clean.
Great salad and service but fish tasted slightly off and roll was smaller than expected for the 13$ price tag

Their crispy rolls made fresh on request were awesome!!! The cashier sweet and polite. I love it when they try to customize the sushi as much as they can according to your taste, Ahem meaning a whole lot of extra avocado. The food court plenty of space to get some seats and enjoy the atrium music. You can also watch the people ice skating for a nice view. Cool spot!
